name: Sarver Game
description:
A story, a story, a story! Pieces of everything are falling down! Why is that? Somebody said the authorities are watching you, it's true! It's a story game but bloody good!
Summary: A extremely violent story told from completely different angles! It was written by two people who love video games and definitely want to enjoy what they've created. It takes place in a small town where things seem to be very mysterious, but don't worry as the authorities have all but forgotten about you! Did you forget, did you forget? This story will take you to a wide range of weird places – hidden in the woods, on the beach, to the abandoned temple, aboard a train, in a gigantic animatronic monster – the government has no idea it even exists! In spite of all the confusion, the player should still feel free to explore according to their own desire! Please, enjoy!
